```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```


```{r}
data_8 <- read_excel("referencetable06072022accessible.xlsx", 
                   sheet = "Table 8",
                   skip = 3)
head(data_8)
```
```{r}
#rename columns to not have spaces between them; easier to work with
data_8 <- data_8 %>% rename(Cause_of_death = `Cause of Death`, Age_group = `Age group`, Jabbed = `Vaccination status`, Deaths = `Count of Deaths`)
data_8$Deaths <- data_8$Deaths %>% as.numeric() #set to numeric
data_8 <- data_8 %>%  filter(!is.na(Deaths)) #remove NAs
```

```{r}
data_8$`Count of Deaths` <- as.numeric(data_8$`Count of Deaths`)
hist(data_8$`Count of Deaths`)
```


```{r}
by_vax_status_age <- data_8 %>% filter(`Cause of Death` == 'All causes') %>% group_by(`Vaccination status`,`Age group`) 

ggplot(by_vax_status_age, aes(x = Month, y = Count of Deaths, color = Age group))+
  geom_line()
```
